title: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service
quoteText: You agree to defend, indemnify and hold us harmless, as well as our affiliates and vendors and respective directors, officers, Users and agents, from and against all claims, SUITS, and expenses, including attorneys' fees
